title: amazing structure
text: To learn, this was discovered recently. You have to see the column of tears and medusa heads. Very nicely lit: little damp. World has to rediscover saving and storing water like this

title: the wonderful Palace
text: You have to go looking for the dagger - topkapi dagger: new addition is the Spoon diamond: the mosaics are nice. Good vantage point to see bosphorous

title: smaller version of blue mosque
text: Blue mosque was in scaffolding when we visited - so this was a consolation prize. Beautiful, clean and well kept

title: Enjoy the beauty
text: What an amazing structure. You just want to absorb every detail and relive the moment. The huge domes, half domes, gold foil mosaics: the beauty has to be seen and believed.

title: wonderful
text: White as snow terrace pools. It is a sight to behold - mother nature in all her glory. Walk up and down : enjoy the hot water falls. Be mindful and protect the structures.

title: ancient city
text: wonder about the people in the ancient city, to have constructed beautiful cities, building: enjoy the terrace pools and go to other cities to enjoy the ruins

title: not worth it
text: it was crowded in the shoulder season. did not feel the value of it to pay extra to get into that small pool. You might as well enjoy the terrace pools

title: very nice resort
text: It is in a quite area: with 3 swimming pools ? one indoor, 2 outdoor. Very nice area. We could see hot air balloons floating in the sky in the morning. very nice sight. It looks new and shiny. Very well maintained. Food was also good.

title: Ephesus
text: It must have been a sight in those days to see the fountain, the market, the vendors and the opulent street. They were visionaries. To see the library, the buildings - apartments with mosaic, paintings in the area.

title: ancient monument
text: It is astonishing that in those times, the architects, planners had vision and forethought to build this grand monument. You have to imagine what a grand temple it was. It must have been such an awe inspiring sight to people, especially from the city below. Even with all the modern equipment, computers etc, it is unimaginable that we can build a temple, monument of this caliber.

title: Huge and a beautiful monument
text: It has commanding views: changing of guards is also very good. It has a beautiful garden. Very well done monument for the father of the nation. He is revered, for a very good reason.

title: ideal location
text: You can enjoy the views of monasteries: enjoy a beautiful sunset or sunrise. It;s a huge hotel, with big areas for people to lounge , have conversations: enjoyed our stay. Hotel is clean and shining. Our check in and check out was a breeze.

title: ancient flea market
text: Feel that you are wandering here in ancient times. now, it is a good place to go shopping for cheap things and browse and browse. or sit and enjoy a cup of coffee or a drink

title: Good decor and food
text: Our party of 10, had good food, enjoyed the ambience. Service was also good. Our food arrived on a timely fashion

title: hotel on the main road
text: Hotel is okay, but very very noisy at night and day too. faces a very busy street. After a long day, this hotel is not a ideal location. Breakfast was also average. It has 4 star rating- but does not have the feel or the look of that rating. You pay extra for that rating.

title: Huge gorge
text: Engineering the bridge is a sight. Gorge is not carved by the river like Grand Canyon. River looks tiny from above. It’s fast moving. Nice to go at sunset just for the views

title: Quaint restaurant
text:
They do not take credit cards or checks
Food was very good ( vegetarian). It looked like lot of locals or regulars were there . It’s a rustic place. Staff took the time to listen. Please reserve in advance

title: Continuously occupied native area
text: They are still maintaining their culture, language, way of living. Adobe homes, built for summer and winter. Secured from attacks. There is a small cemetery. The tribal head, leaders were brave, daring. Hearing the history from the guide is important.

title: Went looking for this
text: New Mexico Italian eatery. It was a Sunday and they were crowded and waitress was very busy. Food was okay, expected more I guess

title: Went to Mars
text: Mars on earth. Gypsum as sand is only in other place / planet is mars. What an awesome view, experience. Seeing the video at the visitor center gives a picture of the how and what of the area. Sand is cool to walk on even in the heat. Good to go for the ranger guided sunset visit

title: Beautiful drive
text:
You see different terrain, beautiful views, small towns.
Many historical spots. Snow capped mountains in the distance. Take your time to savor the beauty

title: Basilica in Santa Fe
text: Beautiful stained glass windows. Huge organ. It has an imposing presence near the plaza. Beautiful , colorful arches. Typical New Mexico tiles.
place: The Cathedral Basilica of St. Francis of Assisi

title: Old house
text: If you have seen any other old homes from that era, it’s the same. For the children it will be good to visit

title: A brave lady, with an eye for beauty
text: Seeing the video of her life was eye opener. She was a feminist before the word came about. The paintings are displayed well. She has captured the essence of New Mexico

title: Chapel from history
text: A historic chapel, in the plaza. Rustic but beauty in an unadorned way. So many brave people have passed through.

title: State capitol - a museum
text: It’s beautiful. No fuss people. Local artists are showcased. Mixed media, quilts, paintings, sculptures, pencil drawings. We felt we visited a museum. Staff were very nice. A must visit

title: New Mexico food
text: We had vegetarian enchiladas and Chile relleno- Xmas sauce - that means red and green chille sauce. Wow finger licking good. It’s spicy, but tasty. The chef even gave information on how to make the red sauce . Staff were very good. The place was teaming with customers. It’s near the railroad yard. Area is very nice. Must visit

title: Socorro mission
text: It’s peaceful. For an old church, it is very good. Clean and welcoming . It’s worth a visit in this small town.

title: VLA
text: Long way from Albuquerque but near to Socorro, about an hour and half drive. But worth every minute. Very good staff giving information.

title: Awesome
text: You should take children to learn about this universe and astronomy . It can provide the young minds with lots of interesting information. May be some future astronomers

title: Not good
text:
In a bad shape - needs renovation. Dark and dingy. Small town, not many hotels
Wish they make it a little more inviting . Sheets were crumpled - didn’t put fresh sheets ?
I wouldn’t recommend this as it is now

title: Good accommodation
text: It’s near the airport: still easy commute to old town, downtown, Sandia peak etc. well appointed rooms. Staff were attentive and gave us information about the city, places to visit. They were very happy to tell us about their city

title: Astronomy
text: People on earth are minuscule- in the vast universe . Understanding the universe, how they are studying,researching is amazing. So much to learn, understand. The advancement of technology is mind bending

title: New Mexico - local food
text: Chilli relleno- was fantastic . The red spicy sauce was very tasty. There were quite a few locals.

title: Spicy food
text: We had chille relleno and enchilada. Both of them were good and spicy red chili sauce. It was spicy but also good. Our waitress was very nice, gave some info about the area too

title: Good food
text: Food and prices were good. Place isn’t anything to write about. Service was also good. Food was commendable

title: Sunset at the peak
text:
It gives a panoramic view of the mountains. Ride is smooth. Be ready for winds and cold up on the peak. We had 30 mile winds and temperatures of 45 .
The restaurant isn’t open yet on the peak. Sunset was beautiful. Keep in mind- most of the restaurants in the city close at 9 pm. If the sunset is at 7.45pm- you come down at 8.15 - you have to think about it, overall it’s an excellent outing

title: Hot air ballon
text:
It was a beautiful day, easy winds, lots of questions and answered! The thrill of a balloon ride -checked off bucket list.
It was very good, but kind of it wasn’t- thrilling- maybe there were no ups and downs on a mountain/ valleys; or on the river/ or architectural wonders

title: 13th century cliff dwellings
text:
How hard life was at that time. Geologists, archeologists have done tremendous job to give us a glimpse of that time period. Hunters, gatherers, worked as a community.
Well maintained, very good information provided. Well maintained trails. It was a very good experience. Day was beautiful

title: great stay
text:
Candice the manager was helpful in resolving a small issue for mutual satisfaction.
Hotel is right behind the water tower place and very close to attractions, and Northwestern hospital that we were visiting.

title: Jain temples on the hill: Beautiful architecture.
text:
1. Yes you climb about 3500 steps. But they are easy steps and some flat walking in between.

2. Definitely start as early as you can to beat the sun and heat

3. WATER: They DO NOT allow plastic bottles. Westerners seem like exception as they were carrying it. Water is available on the way, but if you are concerned about drinking water everywhere like us, then plan to carry metal containers for water. This was tough part of our trip as we did not get to drink water for a few hours.

4. They may NOT allow leather hand bags, purses, camera bags etc.

5. Camera: You can take pictures outside. Once inside the shrine cameras are NOT allowed. That is where the beautiful architecture is. So think if it is worth carrying heavy SLR cameras.

6. Yes the trip can be completed in 4-5 hours if you want to, But why? Engross yourself in majesty of so many temples and plan to spend some leisurely time.

7. You don't have to be religious to immerse yourself in the scintillating experience.
Any one who is reasonably healthy can walk. It is worth it.

title: they have more vegetarian options now
text: better choices for vegetarians. Food also tasted good. it was not that crowded when we visited. Attentive staff also

title: Here halloween nights are fun for the family: and also especially in fall and winter
text: It is a natural spring, that becomes a fast flowing river. Almost glass like surface: clean water: Nostalgic to watch the mermaids: go in the boat on the river. A lazy sunday afternoon outing

title: we go to watch the sunset
text: a million dollar sunsets most of the time. Nature at its best. we have seen dolphins many times. slides, swings for the kids: shelters for people to sit / have picnics or just idle.

title: Whirlpool aero car
text:
It was a good ride : but you get to see more of the water flow at the board walk.
It is a very short ride.

title: Journey behind the falls,
text: It was great, especially for our grandson: hearing the thunder of the falls, going behind it was wonderful

title: it is worth a look
text: It was awesome to hear the roar of the water: wonderful colors : yet so peaceful to sit and look at the water: great experience

title: wonder of the water
text: Canadian falls is majestic: the force, the sound, mist everything adds to the drama. Lighting at night is beautiful : fireworks was picturesque

title: best way to commute
text: It is easy and best way to commute between the falls and other areas. Only draw back is they stop running at 9.30pm and the fireworks started at 10pm.. The pass is good for 48 hours: it is good for the money

title: cross into USA or canada
text: It is a border crossing bridge. No problems or not a whole lot of wait to cross the bridge. On holidays, it might take a bit of time to cross.

title: spring and summer visit is good
text: It is neat : but we didn't get to see a whole lot of flowers!! It is a nice outing on a cool day. The clock chimes every 15 minutes. Good photo op

title: Good place to go to meditate
text: There is a huge bronze Buddha statue: there is also another hall with some statues and 1000 small buddha statues also. The garden area has more buddhas : very peaceful

title: indian restaurant in Reykjavik
text:
In the land of fire and ice, finding " indian" is awesome. Great atmosphere, nice decor ( get to see different pictures from the past: little niches of indian art): service is very good. Food (vegetarian) was presented well: tasted equally awesome: on time.
they are open only for dinner- go with a good appetite.
Thoroughly enjoyed the food and ambience.

title: beautiful architecture and views are wonderful
text: Amazing architecture ( has won a few honors): echoes the landscape of the city: wonderful views of the harbor and mountains
place: Harpa Reykjavik Concert Hall and Conference Centre

title: Beautiful church
text: One of the places to see the beautiful city from the tower. They have a huge organ, that sounds way out of this world. Get a glimpse of the colorful city

title: Family friendly cozy restaurant
text:
Food is always tasty and fresh
service is wonderful
smiling, attentive service
feels like family when we visit

staff treat you like you are friends
